page.title: 07The Donkey Derby
page.content: On Saturday 6th or July we had a Donkey Derby at Weare school.We hired some racing donkeys.They came in a lorry which stopped in our field.At 2 p.m. the Donkey Derby opened.The races started at 2:30 so if you came at 2:00 you could look around the side shows.There were games like hoopla, skittles,fishing and china-smashing.There were cold and hot drinks to be bought and doughnuts, cakes,candy -floss and ice-cream to be eaten.Everything was different on the school field.There were orange ropes where the donkeys were going to run and two large tents near the swimming pool.In front of the tents was the Tote.The Tote is a place where you can bet on the donkey you would like to win.If your donkey wins you get quite a lot of money.I enjoyed my day at the Donkey Derby!
